text: In the UI Toolkit, what is the purpose of a VisualElement?

options.text: It's the base class for all elements in the UI Toolkit
It's used for applying visual effects to UI elements
It's a class used for audio elements in the UI
It's used for creating 3D visual elements in the UI

feedbackCorrect: VisualElement is the base class for all elements in the UI Toolkit. It is the core primitive from which all user interface controls and containers derive.
feedbackIncorrect: VisualElement is not used for applying visual effects, audio elements, or creating 3D visual elements in the UI. It is the base class for all elements in the UI Toolkit.
